name: Midwest 90: Rapid City(Early Access Demo)
description:
Midwest 90: Rapid City is a survival-tycoon game with a focus on story, where you build and protect your restaurant that cooks and serves monster meat dishes.

In a small town like Rapid City that is suffering through a New Great Depression and mysterious monster attacks, even a restaurant manager can make a difference.

Get to know your local customers and suppliers as you try to keep your restaurant afloat, and uncover the mystery behind the monsters. 

But who do you trust? 

And how far will you go to keep your business alive?

Keep your business going and your customers breathing by arming yourself, training your staff's survivability and setting up traps before the sun goes down….because who knows what the night will bring?

Make bizarre yet oddly delicious-looking monster dishes from monster meat! Different dishes have different effects on your customers, so it's up to you on how you want to set your menu - to make fast money or preserve your customer’s welfare.

Your success depends on how well you keep your business going, and how it impacts Rapid City. These additional features will help you on your journey:

  • Restaurant customization
  • Staff Management System
  • A unique expansion system called Liberty fund
  • Town Welfare(In Progress)
  • Business investments that benefit you and the town

The Concept Art of things In Progress

We are currently still making this game, so please feel free to support us by following our socials and maybe donate to us!

*THIS GAME IS CURRENT JUST AN ALPHA DEMO TO HELP US GET FEEDBACK*
